pull.title: Support make src/bitcoin-node and src/bitcoin-gui
pull.body:
This change adds the following configure output variables
```
dnl Multi Process
BITCOIN_MP_NODE_NAME=bitcoin-node
BITCOIN_MP_GUI_NAME=bitcoin-gui
```
and adds support for
```sh
make src/bitcoin-node src/bitcoin-gui
```

events.body: Code review ACK e491f754ce23c18af06f19ab168a5981d308f021. Seems reasonable. I didn't know about these shortcuts or I would have included this in #18677
@ryanofsky right, I was reviewing #19160 but didn't want to add this noise there. Maybe I should add bitcoin-gui too? others?

> @ryanofsky right, I was reviewing #19160 but didn't want to add this noise there. Maybe I should add bitcoin-gui too? others?

Sure, more consistency is more better
